title: Primordia
notes: Mouse-only controls. **Decky Plugin: Works out of the box**. **2.0 Standalone: Works out of the box**.
description: Life has ceased. Man is but a myth. And now, even the machines have begun to fail. Lead Horatio Nullbuilt and his sarcastic sidekick Crispin on a journey through the crumbling world of Primordia...
